intro: Lindernia macrantha, commonly known as the large-flowered lindernia, is a flowering plant native to parts of South America. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in wetlands or along stream banks. Lindernia macrantha is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
